title: Deadly Australians. Episodes 3&4
brief_description: This video describes some of the most dangerous animals in Australia, and some which you would not think are dangerous! Presented by Tina Dalton, we investigate creatures found in the ‘Arid and wetland environment’, such as snakes, kangaroos and crocodiles, and ‘Perils in suburbia’, dangerous creatures that are encountered around homes and suburbs, such as spiders, ants and bees.
